| HistoryText             = The Elite Guard were soldiers were sole duties were to guard [[Lilandra Neramani (Earth-616)|Lilandra]] and enforce her will. Two Guardsmen were sent to retrieve a holo-scroll sent to [[Sharra Neramani (Earth-616)|Deathcry]] by her nanny [[K'rin (Earth-616)|K'rin]]. After shooting down Deathcry's ship while it was above the [[Luna (Moon)|Moon]], they took the holo-scroll and shocking nearly beat Deathcry to death. Before the Guardsmen could leave the moon, they were killed by the Shi'ar warrior [[Za'ken (Earth-616)|Za'ken]].{{r|Avengers Vol 1 398}}
